Text:
So....is this the real film?  The others that have been posted are not "The Rift," but "Rift" which is a very bad thriller.

It should be this film:
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1954972/
No, this is not the Sci Fi one (The Rift) - it's the Thriller from 2011 (Rift). Oh well, suppose I will watch it anyway.

geez ... what a waste of dowload. Definitely not the right movie! Dont you guys check what you are adding? Pretty C or D grade movie this one. It is RIFT not the rift which I think we are all waiting for - uploader can you correct your details.
